openerSection: The IndusInd Bank Indulge Credit Card is one of the top-end offerings by the IndusInd bank. It is a Visa credit card targeted at HNIs (high net-worth individuals). With an inlay of pure 22K gold and a glossy reflective finishing, the card feels really premium to hold. While aesthetics is certainly a distinguishing feature of the card, the card also offers real value for money with privileges including a complimentary Priority Pass membership (with unlimited complimentary lounge visits), 24×7 concierge service, air accident cover (worth Rs. 2.5 crores), and many other premium benefits.

Another unique feature of this card is that it has no pre-set credit limit as the base limit on the revolving credit is quite flexible. You can also save a lot on your international transaction as it comes with a very low foreign currency markup fee of 1.8% only. In this post, we have discussed in detail all the features, benefits, and rewards that you get with the IndusInd Bank Indulge credit card. Read on to learn more about this premium offering by the IndusInd bank.
